item.title: GotDotNet.Com要退休了
item.description: http://www.gotdotnet.com/ GotDotNet Phase-out Announcement Microsoft announces changes to the GotDotNet phase-out schedule. Overall phase-out will be completed in summer 2007. Based on your feedback, we’ve made some adjustments to our schedule: CodeGallery phase-out – Rescheduled to July 2007 (original phase-out date was April 24, 2007) This gives CodeGallery owners more time to migrate. We suggest CodePlex as an excellent alternative.
